name: The Life And Work of Marie Curie AKA The Expert At The End of The Hall
name_original: The Life And Work of Marie Curie AKA The Expert At The End of The Hall
description:
Content Warnings: (Flashing Images, Bright Lights, Light Gore, Scary Faces)

Greetings, scholar!

Welcome to The Life And Work of Marie Curie - The Museum of Radioactive Sciences. Presented to you by Pripyat Industries.

This museum is entirely constructed from Uranium, and is made up of approximately 925,925,925.925 KG of pure uranium. Do not fear, however, because our Expert has assured us that the 1000 rems of gamma radiation emitted by the structure will not be nearly dangerous enough to halt the pursuit of knowledge!

That said, if you run into any problems during your visit, please contact our Expert.

Their office is at the end of the hall.
